text: And it's a man. Chris Weitz will take on the sequel to "Twilight '' . Chris Weitz the director of "The Golden Compass '' and best known for his work with his brother Paul on "American Pie '' is stepping up to do "New Moon '' . Weitz has a good relationship with Summit Studios and is easy to work with. He also has experience with special effects. Of course though it's not official yet. December 14th the announcement will be made for the hiring decision. Just in time to start the pre-production details for this highly anticipated sequel. "Twilight '' has grossed more than 141 million already.
title: Well "New Moon '' has a new director.
